titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the continual recognition of the Nation's semiquincentennial by honoring over 250 years of Americans' service and sacrifice.
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the continual recognition of the Nation's semiquincentennial by honoring over 250 years of Americans' service and sacrifice.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
